text.section: A warrantor of a vehicle protection product that is sold or offered for sale in the State shall register with the Division on the form that the Division provides.

section.section: A warrantor that registers under subsection (a) of this section shall pay a registration fee to the Division at the time of registration.
On January 1 of each year following a warrantor's initial registration, the warrantor shall pay a renewal fee to the Division.
The registration fee and the renewal fee required under this subsection shall be set by the Division in an amount not exceeding $500 for each fee.
